title: HiSET Finances Prompt
prompt:
Financial health is often neglected. A common rule is that individuals or families should have an emergency fund in savings equal to six months’ worth of expenses. While it can be difficult to save this amount, with budgeting and a savings plan, most people can begin building savings. Your employer is printing a pamphlet for distribution to all employees about financial health.

Write an essay for the pamphlet in which you argue that every resident should implement one new way to improve their financial health. Think carefully about what reasons will convince your coworkers to change their behavior.
feedback: Thank you for your response! We will grade your essay and get you feedback soon.
